thread.section_title: Gardner-White Furniture Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Gardner-White Furniture | www.gardner-white.com | 14 of 227
thread.title: Beth Hodge
thread.title_full: Gardner-White Furniture reviewed by Beth Hodge

author: Beth Hodge
title: Beth Hodge
text:
Sales department did a great job even though I visited 4 times. The sales reps were very willing to show me several samples and answer any and all questions.
After my purchase, the delivery department gave a delivery window, The delivery men did a great job, cushioning the door jambs and placing a rug on the inside entrance. Both were very professional and personal men.
Thanks a lot.
